All Pages Posts Now

Babysteps

Summary

General concept I’ve been using for a series of learning posts aimed at people with no knowledge of the given topic.

Jots

My Babysteps posts are motivated by the fact that most official tutorials are aimed at folks with a solid grounding in the general topic and just need to know the details of how to apply them with a given topic. There’s often a gap for step zero: learning material for folks who are reasonably intelligent and curious learners, but don’t know what tutorial authors consider the “fundamentals.”

My Babysteps Posts and Series

post/2007/Interactive Fiction with Python

post/2009/Parrot Babysteps

post/2005/Perl Babysteps

post/2001/Python Babysteps Tutorial

post/2010/Rakudo Babysteps 01 - Starting with Rakudo
